title: MUST SEE! Studio Apartment For Rent - Includes Parking/Heat/Hot Water!
posting_body: This second floor 1 -bedroom apartment in Aurora.
Conveniently located near local shopping, entertainment, and transportation.

This house is in the good location, it’s close the transportation, surroundings quite and safety area, the owner and other roommates are very friendly, $1100 rental fees including WiFi, Water, Electric, Laundry, Dishes cleaners, and toilet papers.
Freshly painted ready to move in!
